keyword: how many calories in a large potato
title: How Many Calories in a Large Potato?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a large potato, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition details per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Large Potato?
assumptions: Baked russet potato with skin; large size â‰ˆ 300 g raw weight, no added butter, oil, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato variety, size, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A large baked potato provides ~291 kcal and ~69 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a large baked potato?
faqs.a: About 291 kcal for a 300 g baked russet potato with skin.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a large potato?
faqs.a: Approximately 69 g carbs, including 9 g fiber.
No, a large potato has about 8 g protein; it's mostly carbs.

faqs.q: How does boiling affect calories in a large potato?
faqs.a: Similar to baking at ~291 kcal, but boiling may retain more water and slightly alter texture.

faqs.q: What size is a large potato for nutrition?
faqs.a: Typically 300 g raw; adjust values if your potato differs in weight.
